selected_quotes: Human genetics is about human beings--about humanity and humaneness
Moving, thought-provoking piece by Gholson Lyon about returning genetic results to research subjects
It's frustrating that this very important commentary on human genetics research is behind a pay-wall
Getting genomic data back to patients--important! and #digitalhealth

news.title: Stopping 23andMe Will Harm Medicine
news.summary: Gholson Lyon, Conversation Genetic testing is a powerful tool. Two years ago, with the help of my colleagues, it was this tool that helped us identify a new disease. The disease, called Ogden Syndrome, caused the death of a four-month old child named Max.

news.title: Stopping 23andMe will only delay the revolution medicine needs
news.summary: We need to collect billions of data points for analysis by computers, and the only company in major contention to do this soon is 23andMe. Genetic testing is a powerful tool. Two years ago, with the help of my colleagues, it was this tool that helped us id

news.title: Stopping 23andMe Will Only Delay the Revolution Medicine Needs (Op-Ed)
news.summary: Genetic testing is a powerful tool yet, the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has ordered 23andMe to stop marketing their service.
